caption:
Build Your Base, Boost Your Glow! 💚✨

Introducing On-the-Glow Base—the hydrating tinted balm designed for everyone and every moment! This multi-tasking balm instantly smooths and blurs, evening out skin-tone while delivering a naturally radiant, fresh-faced Glow in just one swipe! Infused with Ceramide NP to lock in moisture, Superfood Berries for antioxidant care and Fruit Oils to renew and nourish, this lightweight formula blends seamlessly into complexion, leaving it looking and feeling its best!

Why you'll love this travel friendly must-have:
✔️ Instant Hydration – Comforts and nourishes skin 
✔️ Weightless & Buildable – Sheer-to-custom coverage for every look
✔️ Blurring & Brightening – Softens, corrects and evens out skin-tone while enhancing radiance

Customize your most even-skinned Glow effortlessly with your match of our 18 skin-adoring hues!

Excited? Us too! 🥰 Drop a 💚 below if you can´t wait to try, you never know who we might surprise next! ✨

#PixiBeauty #PixiPerfect #OnTheGlow #GlowUnwrapped #PixiGlow #GlowUp #FoundationGoals #GlowOnTheGo #ComplexionGlow #CorrectandGlow
